query: UPDATE marketing_group SET name = COALESCE(?1, name), display_name = COALESCE(?2, display_name), description = COALESCE(?3, description), sort_order = COALESCE(?4, sort_order), points_earn_rate = COALESCE(?5, points_earn_rate), is_active = COALESCE(?6, is_active), updated_at = ?7 WHERE id = ?8
